name: Unite UX
description:
Unite UX is a design-to-development UI components style builder, leveraging the Telerik and Kendo UI web components. On the design side, the Unite UX plugin supports the transfer of metrics, layers, components, icons and design tokens from Figma to the developers using the Unite UX app.  

 

Kickstart your UI library by using the Telerik and Kendo UI kits based on Bootstrap and Material Design and modify to your vision and needs. When you’re ready to handoff the designs, export from Figma via the Unite UX plugin and share with the team of developers. Hassle-free! 

 

Now your development team is ready to implement your design requirements on top of the Telerik and Kendo UI components in an assisted way, no code. The result is the ready-to-use CSS and SASS of your component library and a generated custom documentation in Storybook.
